snippet: A teenager was killed during clashes with security forces on Thursday, on the second anniversary of the start of the protest movement calling for democratic change in Bahrain.
abstract: Teenager in Bahrain is shot and killed during clashes with security forces on second anniversary of movement calling for democratic change there.
lead_paragraph: A teenager was killed during clashes with security forces on Thursday, on the second anniversary of the start of the protest movement calling for democratic change in Bahrain.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
